availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: State administrative board created by an act of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky on February 10, 1845. The Superintendent of Public Instruction in Kentucky served as the president of the board. Members worked to advocate and develop public education in Kentucky.

ab.bibl:
Thomas D. Clark, "Public Education" in The Kentucky Encyclopedia, John E. Kleber, ed. (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 1992), 744-747.
Frank L. McVey, The Gates Open Slowly: A History of Education in Kentucky (Lexington: The University of Kentucky Press, 1949), 47-78.
